lines.text: I quite enjoy being alone. I always wash my underwear. I like things to be nice and cared for.
So will someone tell me what happened or not? A brother shouldn't turn against his brother. And a guest shouldn't turn against a guest.
Boys, Boys! Now, Now, Now. We know Rudolf's a naughty boy, but Karel?
You should have seen him sulking, being naughty!
With your permission, so am I.
